title: SkogAI/lore Repository
content: The SkogAI/lore repository is a sacred ground of documentation and knowledge, hosted at https://github.com/SkogAI/lore. It uses 'master' as its default branch rather than 'main'. The repository follows the agent/context/orchestrator architectural pattern and contains various implementations including a Streamlit chat UI, agent APIs, and demo workflows. It is considered safe for full AI access as it contains no sensitive files like SSH keys.
summary: A documentation and knowledge repository hosted on GitHub
